tool.name: digest (6.5.7)
tool.description: Protein proteolytic enzyme or reagent cleavage digest

param.name: unfavoured
param.label: Trypsin will not normally cut after a K if it is followed by (e.g.) another K or a P. Specifying this shows those cuts, as well as the favoured ones.

param.name: overlap
param.label: Used for partial digestion. Shows all cuts from favoured cut sites plus 1..3, 2..4, 3..5 etc but not (e.g.) 2..5. Overlaps are therefore fragments with exactly one potential cut site within it.

param.name: allpartials
param.label: As for overlap but fragments containing more than one potential cut site are included.

tool.help:
You can view the original documentation here_.
.. _here: http://emboss.sourceforge.net/apps/release/5.0/emboss/apps/digest.html
------

A framework for collaborative analysis of ENCODE data: making large-scale analyses biologist-friendly. Genome Res. 2007 Jun;17(6):960-4. <http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/17568012>`_
